sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { Row, Col, Form, Label, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, } from "reactstrap" import Breadcrumbs from "../../components/Common/Breadcrumb" // Form Mask import InputMask from "react-input-mask" import MaterialInput from "@material-ui/core/Input" const FormMask = () => { const ISBN1 = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) const ISBN2 = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) const ISBN3 = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) const IPV4 = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) const IPV6 = props => ( {inputProps => } ) const TAX = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) const Phone = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) const Currency = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) const Date1 = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) const Date2 = props => ( {inputProps => ( )} ) return (
Example
e.g "999-99-999-9999-9"
999 99 999 9999 9
999/99/999/9999/9
192.168.110.310
4deg:1340:6547:2:540:h8je:ve73:98pd
99-9999999
(999) 999-9999
$ 999,999,999.99
dd/mm/yyyy
dd-mm-yyyy
) } export default FormMask
